name: LD 33 entry: Kaiju A-Go-Go
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 33 - "You are the Monster", Kaiju A-go-go sees you take on the mantle of a poorly drawn Kaiju monster, making its way through the city, dodging bullets, destroying tanks in a rampage of destruction in order to reach the sea.

Yes, I know there's a game already called this. But I came up with the name at 3am and I was clearly not thinking straight :P
